00022 FunctionBar::FunctionBar(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00023  : QWidget(parent, name)
00024 {
00025    xSetup();
00026 }
00027

00029 FunctionBar::~FunctionBar()
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00033 void FunctionBar::xSetup()
00034 {
00035    //DAVID Setup Background;
00036    pixBackground.load("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/FunctionBarBackground.jpg");
00037    setBackgroundPixmap(pixBackground);
00038    
00039    //DAVID Init BarInternet
00040    BarInternet=new SubBarInternet(this);
00041    BarInternet->setGeometry(115,0,550,80);
00042    BarInternet->hide();
00043    
00044    //DAVID Init BarPlayer
00045    BarPlayer=new SubBarPlayer(this);
00046    BarPlayer->setGeometry(115,0,550,80);
00047    BarPlayer->hide();
00048    
00049    //DAVID Init BarManagement
00050    BarManagement=new SubBarManagement(this);
00051    BarManagement->setGeometry(115,0,550,80);
00052    BarManagement->hide();
00053    
00054    //DAVID Init BarAC
00055    BarAC=new SubBarAlbumClock(this);
00056    BarAC->setGeometry(115,0,550,80);
00057    BarAC->hide();
00058    
00059    //DAVID Init SubBarSetting
00060    BarSetting=new SubBarSetting(this);
00061    BarSetting->setGeometry(115,0,550,80);
00062    BarSetting->hide();
00063    
00064    //DAVID Init BarClose
00065    BarClose=new SubBarClose(this);
00066    BarClose->setGeometry(115,0,550,80);
00067    BarClose->hide();
00068    
00069    //DAVID Init BarID ,ImageDetial
00070    BarID=new SubBarAlbumClock(this);
00071    BarID->setGeometry(115,0,550,80);
00072    BarID->hide();
00073    
00074    //DAVID Set the Current Setting to the ba state
00075    slotChangeFunctionSubBar(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00076    
00077 }
00078 
00079 void FunctionBar::slotChangeFunctionSubBar(int FuncMode)
00080 {
00081   #if TRACE
00082   qWarning("slotChangeFunctionSubBar::%d",FuncMode);
00083   #endif
00084   if(FuncMode==em_internet)
00085   {
00086     BarInternet->show();
00087     BarPlayer->hide();
00088     BarManagement->hide();
00089     BarAC->hide();
00090     BarSetting->hide();
00091     BarClose->hide();
00092     BarID->hide();
00093     //DAVID Change  DisplayArea Mode
00094     GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE=em_display_internet;
00095     emit siganlChangeDisplayAreaMode(GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE);    
00096   }
00097   else if(FuncMode==em_player)
00098   {
00099     BarInternet->hide();
00100     BarPlayer->show();
00101     BarManagement->hide();
00102     BarAC->hide();
00103     BarSetting->hide();
00104     BarClose->hide();
00105     BarID->hide();
00106     //DAVID Change  DisplayArea Mode
00107     GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE=em_display_player;
00108     emit siganlChangeDisplayAreaMode(GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE);    
00109   }
00110   else if(FuncMode==em_management)
00111   {
00112     BarInternet->hide();
00113     BarPlayer->hide();
00114     BarManagement->show();
00115     BarAC->hide();
00116     BarSetting->hide();
00117     BarClose->hide();
00118     BarID->hide();
00119     //DAVID Change  DisplayArea Mode
00120     GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE=em_display_management;
00121     emit siganlChangeDisplayAreaMode(GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE);    
00122   
00123   }
00124   else if(FuncMode==em_albumclock)
00125   {
00126     BarInternet->hide();
00127     BarPlayer->hide();
00128     BarManagement->hide();
00129     BarAC->show();
00130     BarSetting->hide();
00131     BarClose->hide();
00132     BarID->hide();
00133     //DAVID Change  DisplayArea Mode
00134     emit siganlChangeDisplayAreaMode(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_ALBUMCLOCK_STATE+3);    
00135   }
00136   else if(FuncMode==em_setting)
00137   {
00138     BarInternet->hide();
00139     BarPlayer->hide();
00140     BarManagement->hide();
00141     BarAC->hide();
00142     BarSetting->show();
00143     BarClose->hide();
00144     BarID->hide();
00145     //DAVID Change  DisplayArea Mode
00146     GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE=em_display_setting;
00147     emit siganlChangeDisplayAreaMode(GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE);    
00148   }
00149   else if(FuncMode==em_close)
00150   {
00151     BarInternet->hide();
00152     BarPlayer->hide();
00153     BarManagement->hide();
00154     BarAC->hide();
00155     BarSetting->hide();
00156     BarClose->show();
00157     BarID->hide();
00158     //DAVID Change  DisplayArea Mode
00159     GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE=em_display_close;
00160     emit siganlChangeDisplayAreaMode(GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE);    
00161   }
00162    else if(FuncMode==em_imagedetial)
00163   {
00164     BarInternet->hide();
00165     BarPlayer->hide();
00166     BarManagement->hide();
00167     BarAC->hide();
00168     BarSetting->hide();
00169     BarClose->hide();
00170     BarID->show();
00171   }
00172 }
